column1: In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the root ÁYAR-
column2: AIR- (with an [[Wikipedia:Inverted breve|inverted breve below]] on the "I") signifying "sea
column3: only used of the inner seas of Middle-earth"
column4: derived from root [[AY|AY-]]. The root yields the [[Quenya]] derivatives ''ear (earen)''
